page.title: 06 Pop Music
page.content: Pop music is something most young people and teenagers listen to . There a many stars in the pop world and more a more groups are forming every day. The top 40 is a list of bsongs put in selling order the one that sells best goes to number one .You can listen to the the best sellers on the radio or watch them on Top of the Pops . The sonngs make their way up the charts to trie to get to number one . After a while they go back down the charts and out of the Top 40 . Top of the Pops has been going for 20 years . It is on for half an hour once a week . They have guests on with new song entries in the charts . They play the number one seller at the end of the show . There are magazines which you can buy which have pictures and song words in . A. BOTOLTHO 12 Yrs.
